abstract: California regulators announced Tuesday that they are seeking as much as $1.33 billion in penalties from PacifiCare as a result of widespread problems stemming from its takeover two years ago by healthcare giant UnitedHealth Group.
lead_paragraph: California regulators announced Tuesday that they are seeking as much as $1.33 billion in penalties from PacifiCare as a result of widespread problems stemming from its takeover two years ago by healthcare giant UnitedHealth Group.

headline.main: UnitedHealth Faces Fine Related to PacifiCare Merger
